items.name: app-api-auth
items.docs:
--- What's next? ---

  1. Update the necessary environment variables.
  2. Execute `npm --env-file=.env drizzle-kit push` to create PostgreSQL tables.
  3. Start the development server with `npm run dev`.
  4. Access http://localhost:3000/access to test the sign-in/sign-up functionality.
  5. Navigate to http://localhost:3000/x to verify the protected route.
